body.p: Lewis County, Kentucky, farmer. Lewis County, Kentucky, native. Son of Reuben Bloomfield and Elizabeth Bloomfield. Married to Elizabeth Stafford Bloomfield in Lewis County, Kentucky, on December 18, 1859. Father of Elizabeth Bloomfield, Emma Bloomfield, William W. Bloomfield, and Alonso W. Bloomfield. Resident of Carter County in 1850. Farmer in Lewis County in 1860.
